Text.Page:
Mission Orders

The Scions of Lok have employed massive naga mercenaries. We can't afford to let them secure their position.

Hunt {@LinkCreature:7#23#juggernaut mercenaries} in the eastern Cardovek Remnants, and report to Zandra in Lumbertown when the mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to us all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
